subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: James Neal had a goal and an assist, and the Pittsburgh Penguins fired a barrage of shots at Carolina goalie Justin Peters before finally breaking him in a 4-2 victory over the Hurricanes.
snippet: James Neal had a goal and an assist, and the Pittsburgh Penguins fired a barrage of shots at Carolina goalie Justin Peters before finally breaking him in a 4-2 victory over the Hurricanes.
